meta_description: Founded in 1871, the Salmagundi Club is one of the oldest art organizations in the United States and New York’s oldest art club. We're a historic hub for the fine arts and a registered 501(c)(3) non-profit.
collections_text:

## Join our mailing list

If you’re a Salmagundi member who needs to change email addresses, please reach out to the Club Secretary. Using our website’s form to sign up will not grant access to member-only notices.

Email Address  Calls for entry  Events  Exhibitions  Classes  Weekly news  Monthly news  SUBSCRIBE
